verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician אַל־ [T'al- תַּ֭שְׁחֵת <WH516> Tash-chet Altaschith לְדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid of David מִכְתָּ֑ם <WH4387> mich-Tam; Michtam בְּבָרְח֥וֹ <WH1272> be-va-re-Cho when he fled מִפְּנֵי־ <WH6440> mip-pe-nei-Sha- from שָׁ֝א֗וּל <WH7586> 'Ul, Saul בַּמְּעָרָֽה׃ <WH4631> bam-me-'a-Rah. in the cave חָנֵּ֤נִי <WH2603> chon-ne-ni Be merciful אֱלֹהִ֨ים׀ <WH430> E-lo-Him unto me O God חָנֵּ֗נִי <WH2603> chon-ne-ni be merciful כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for בְךָ֮ ve-Cha חָסָ֪יָה <WH2620> cha-Sa-yah trusteth נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> naf-Shi unto me for my soul וּבְצֵֽל־ <WH6738> u-ve-tzel- in thee yea in the shadow כְּנָפֶ֥יךָ <WH3671> ke-na-Fei-cha of thy wings אֶחְסֶ֑ה <WH2620> 'ech-Seh; will I make my refuge עַ֝֗ד <WH5704> 'Ad, Until יַעֲבֹ֥ר <WH5674> ya-'a-Vor be overpast הַוּֽוֹת׃ <WH1942> hav-Vot. until [these] calamities

אֶ֭קְרָא <WH7121> 'Ek-ra I will cry לֵֽאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> le-lo-Him unto God עֶלְי֑וֹן <WH5945> el-Yon; most high לָ֝אֵ֗ל <WH410> la-'El, unto God גֹּמֵ֥ר <WH1584> go-Mer that performeth עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lai. and

יִשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> yish-Lach He shall send מִשָּׁמַ֨יִם׀ <WH8064> mish-sha-Ma-yim from heaven וְֽיוֹשִׁיעֵ֗נִי <WH3467> ve-yo-shi-'E-ni, and save חֵרֵ֣ף <WH2778> che-Ref me [from] the reproach שֹׁאֲפִ֣י <WH7602> sho-'a-Fi of him that would swallow me up סֶ֑לָה <WH5542> Se-lah; Selah יִשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> yish-Lach shall send forth אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, God חַסְדּ֥וֹ <WH2617> chas-Do his mercy וַאֲמִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH571> va-'a-mit-To. and his truth

נַפְשִׁ֤י׀ <WH5315> naf-Shi My soul בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch [is] among לְבָאִם֮ <WH3833> le-va-'Im lions אֶשְׁכְּבָ֪ה <WH7901> 'esh-ke-Vah [and] I lie לֹ֫הֲטִ֥ים <WH3857> lo-ha-Tim [even among] them that are set on fire בְּֽנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- [even] the sons אָדָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of men שִׁ֭נֵּיהֶם <WH8127> nei-hem whose teeth חֲנִ֣ית <WH2595> cha-Nit [are] spears וְחִצִּ֑ים <WH2671> ve-chitz-Tzim; and arrows וּ֝לְשׁוֹנָ֗ם <WH3956> u-le-sho-Nam, and their tongue חֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> Che-rev sword חַדָּֽה׃ <WH2299> chad-Dah. a sharp

ר֣וּמָה <WH7311> Ru-mah Be thou exalted עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- above הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim above the heavens אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; O God עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al above כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz [be] above all the earth כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3519> ke-vo-De-cha. [let] thy glory

רֶ֤שֶׁת׀ <WH7568> Re-shet a net הֵכִ֣ינוּ <WH3559> he-Chi-nu They have prepared לִפְעָמַי֮ <WH6471> lif-'a-Mai for my steps כָּפַ֪ף <WH3721> ka-Faf is bowed down נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> naf-Shi my soul כָּר֣וּ <WH3738> ka-Ru they have digged לְפָנַ֣י <WH6440> le-fa-Nai before שִׁיחָ֑ה <WH7882> shi-Chah; a pit נָפְל֖וּ <WH5307> na-fe-Lu whereof they are fallen בְתוֹכָ֣הּ <WH8432> ve-to-Chah me into the midst סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. [themselves] Selah

נָ֘כ֤וֹן <WH3559> na-Chon is fixed לִבִּ֣י <WH3820> lib-Bi My heart אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him O God נָכ֣וֹן <WH3559> na-Chon is fixed לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> lib-Bi; my heart אָ֝שִׁ֗ירָה <WH7891> 'a-Shi-rah, I will sing וַאֲזַמֵּֽרָה׃ <WH2167> va-'a-zam-Me-rah. and give praise

ע֤וּרָה <WH5782> 'U-rah Awake up כְבוֹדִ֗י <WH3519> che-vo-Di, my glory ע֭וּרָֽה <WH5782> 'U-rah awake הַנֵּ֥בֶל <WH5035> han-Ne-vel psaltery וְכִנּ֗וֹר <WH3658> ve-chin-Nor, and harp אָעִ֥ירָה <WH5782> 'a-'I-rah I [myself] will awake שָּֽׁחַר׃ <WH7837> Sha-char. early

אוֹדְךָ֖ <WH3034> 'od-Cha I will praise בָעַמִּ֥ים׀ <WH5971> va-'am-Mim among the people אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai; thee O Lord אֲ֝זַמֶּרְךָ֗ <WH2167> 'a-zam-mer-cha, I will sing בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- among אֻמִּֽים׃ <WH3816> 'um-Mim. unto thee among the nations

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for גָדֹ֣ל <WH1419> ga-Dol [is] great עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim unto the heavens חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> chas-De-cha; For thy mercy וְֽעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- against שְׁחָקִ֥ים <WH7834> she-cha-Kim unto the clouds אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH571> 'a-mit-Te-cha. and thy truth

ר֣וּמָה <WH7311> Ru-mah Be thou exalted עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- above שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim above the heavens אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; O God עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al above כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz [be] above all the earth כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3519> ke-vo-De-cha. [let] thy glory
